parameters.name: CheckType
parameters.description:
The data verification method. Valid values:

*   **1**: full data verification.
*   **2**: incremental data verification.

parameters.name: DtsJobId
parameters.description: The ID of the data migration or data synchronization task. You can call the [DescribeDtsJobs](~~209702~~) operation to query the task ID.

parameters.name: PageNumber
parameters.description: The number of the page to return. The value must be an integer that is greater than **0**. Default value: **1**.

parameters.name: PageSize
parameters.description: The number of entries to return on each page.

parameters.name: SchemaName
parameters.description: The name of the schema whose data is verified in the source database.

parameters.name: Status
parameters.description:
The status of the data verification result. Valid values:

*   **-1** (default): All status.
*   **6**: Inconsistent data detected in the table.

parameters.name: TableName
parameters.description: The name of the table whose data is verified in the source database.
